page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: Almost all householders have at least one car. Motor bikes or mopeds are frequent among young men and women, and bicycles among school children. There are minibuses for Shebbear and Merton Primary Schools, and a bus for Great Torrington School. Children walk or get lifts to pick up points both forthat bus and the minibus to the North Devon College, Barnstaple. Private buses run to Shebbear College and Edgehill College, Bideford. Shared transport is common for work with many having lifts. There are many social outings and excursions by private hire coaches. Hills Services run a public bus service via Shebbear to Holsworthy, Bideford and Exeter. All start at Stibb Cross and each service is weekly. There is a twice weekly service from Peters Marland to Bideford and Barnstaple via Torrington
